summary: The video provides a tour of a dog-friendly room at Estelle Manor, showcasing various amenities and facilities. The narrator highlights the presence of a large stables room for their small animal, a foyer with dog supplies like poo bags and treats, and a birthday gift of macarons. The room includes a mini-bar stocked with beverages and snacks (noting that some items incur extra charges), a skincare section (currently empty), and a well-equipped bathroom with various kits for personal care. The bedroom features a TV and wardrobe space. The narrator notes the high cost of the room (£650-£750 per night) due to the inclusion of the dog-friendly amenities and expresses curiosity about the pricing of non-dog-friendly rooms.
keywords: Estelle Manor, dog-friendly room, stables room, mini-bar, snacks, birthday macarons, skincare, bathroom, personal care kits, bedroom, TV, wardrobe, high cost, pet amenities
creator_demographic: Age Range: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
